message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really like it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Can you meet me there?
I can do a bit better than that, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about $105?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $92.50. Can you consider that?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can do $98, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at your minimum price, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Can you consider $92?
I'm not willing to go below my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $100, but that's as low as I can go.
I understand you're at your minimum price, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Can you consider $97.50?
